explanation: [0-0] In a green meadow, a blonde girl wearing a black and white top, white pants, and black rain boots is petting a small white lamb on a wooden pile. Behind her, a white and brown lamb is grazing on the grass. A person wearing a gray top and black pants is facing the brown lamb.

[0-9] Afterward, the little girl strokes the chin of the lamb on the wooden pile. In the next second, the lamb seems to lick the girl's hand. The girl raises her hand and says something, claps her hands, and smiles. English subtitles appear above. The lamb on the wooden pile looks at the other lamb on the ground. Then the black and white lamb jumps onto the wooden pile. The two lambs face the little girl, who raises her hand and touches the chins of the two lambs, her face close to the lambs' heads, kissing them back and forth. Black subtitles appear below.

[9-14] The white and brown lamb behind walks towards the little girl. The black and white lamb lowers its head and is petted by the little girl when it raises its head again. The little girl steps back, smiles, screams, and says something.

[14-22] Subsequently, the white lamb turns its head and jumps off the wooden pile. The little girl looks to the left front as a boy wearing a purple top and black pants approaches from the right and touches the black and white lamb. The little girl turns and runs towards the lamb that jumped off the wooden pile, then hugs the head of the white and brown lamb. The little boy takes a step back and switches hands to touch the black and white lamb before getting scared away. In the background, the person initially wearing the gray top is looking at other lambs in the distance. The little girl turns to look at the black and white lamb on the wooden pile.
